description: Try our easy to follow Beef Stroganoff with Potatoes & Green Beans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stroganoff,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Green beans,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Mushroom,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Soy free,Peanut free
name: Beef Stroganoff with Potatoes & Green Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g can sliced mushrooms in butter sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour and paprika and season with salt and black pepper. Toss diced beef in flour to coat.
Heat butter and oil in a frying pan. Cook onion until soft and golden. Remove onion from pan using a slotted spoon. Increase heat to medium-high and cook beef in batches until golden.
When all of the meat has been cooked, return it to pan with onions. Stir in tomato paste and mushrooms. Stir until combined. Bring to the boil. Cook for 5 mins until beef is tender.
Stir in sour cream. Heat until melted through sauce. Do not boil. Spoon onto plates, sprinkle with parsley. Serve with the steamed vegetables.
